Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Paul Sorrento learns new position
Paul Sorrento has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "C" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Sunday, 6/22/1990
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Junior Ortiz



Date: Monday, 6/23/1990
Subject: Progress of Greg McMichael
Dear Sir,
Greg McMichael is doing pretty good at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 1.37, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
